const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require("html-webpack-plugin");
const webpack = require("webpack"); // \u7528\u4E8E\u8BBF\u95EE\u5185\u7F6E\u63D2\u4EF6

module.exports = {

    rules: [{ test: /\\.txt$/, use: "raw-loader" }],
  },

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const path = require("path");
//\u6E05\u9664build/dist\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\u6587\u4EF6
const CleanWebpackPlugin = require("clean-webpack-plugin");
//\u751F\u6210\u521B\u5EFAHtml\u5165\u53E3\u6587\u4EF6
const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require("html-webpack-plugin");
//\u5C06css\u63D0\u53D6\u5230\u5355\u72EC\u7684\u6587\u4EF6\u4E2D
const MiniCssExtract = require("mini-css-extract-plugin");
//css\u538B\u7F29
const OptimizeCss = require("optimize-css-assets-webpack-plugin");
//\u538B\u7F29js\u6587\u4EF6
const UglifyJsPlugin = require("uglifyjs-webpack-plugin");
//\u5F15\u5165webpack
const webpack = require("webpack");

module.exports = {
  //webpack \u5165\u53E3\u6587\u4EF6
  entry: "./src/index.js",
  //webpack \u8F93\u51FA\u6587\u4EF6\u914D\u7F6E
  output: {
    //\u8F93\u51FA\u6587\u4EF6\u8DEF\u5F84
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, "dist"),
    //\u8F93\u51FA\u6587\u4EF6\u540D
    filename: "k-editor.[hash:8].js",
  },
  //\u914D\u7F6E\u63D2\u4EF6
  plugins: [
    //\u4F7F\u7528\u63D2\u4EF6\u6E05\u9664dist\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\u4E2D\u7684\u6587\u4EF6
    new CleanWebpackPlugin({
      path: "./dist",
    }),
    //\u4F7F\u7528\u63D2\u4EF6\u751F\u6210Html\u5165\u53E3\u6587\u4EF6
    new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
      //\u6A21\u677F\u6587\u4EF6\u8DEF\u5F84
      template: "./src/index.html",
      //\u6A21\u677F\u6587\u4EF6\u540D
      filename: "index.html",
      minify: {
        removeAttributeQuotes: true, //\u5220\u9664\u53CC\u5F15\u53F7,
        collapseWhitespace: true, //\u538B\u7F29\u6210\u4E00\u884C\uFF0C
      },
      hash: true,
    }),
    //\u63D0\u53D6css\u5230style.css\u4E2D
    new MiniCssExtract({
      filename: "style.css",
    }),
  ],
  resolve: {
    // modules: [path.resolve('node_modules')],//\u53EA\u5728\u5F53\u524D\u76EE\u5F55\u4E0B\u67E5\u627E
    alias: {
      //\u522B\u540D
      bootstrap: "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css",
    },
    // mainFields: ['style', 'main'],//\u4F18\u5148\u5BFB\u627Estyle\uFF0C
    // mainFiles: [],//\u5165\u53E3\u6587\u4EF6\u7684\u540D\u5B57,\u9ED8\u8BA4index.js
    // extensions: ['js', 'css', 'json', 'vue']//\u6269\u5C55\u540D\u987A\u5E8F
  },
  //loader\u52A0\u8F7D\u5668\u6A21\u5757\u914D\u7F6E
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        //\u6B63\u5219\u8868\u8FBE\u5F0F\u5339\u914D.css\u4E3A\u540E\u7F00\u7684\u6587\u4EF6
        test: /\\.css$/,
        //\u4F7F\u7528loader
        use: [
          MiniCssExtract.loader,
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "postcss-loader",
          },
        ],
        //\u6B63\u5219\u8868\u8FBE\u5F0F\u5339\u914D.less\u4E3A\u540E\u7F00\u7684\u6587\u4EF6
        //\u4F7F\u7528lodaer\u6765\u5904\u7406
      },
      {
        test: /\\.less$/,
        use: [
          MiniCssExtract.loader,
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "postcss-loader",
          },
          "less-loader",
        ],
      },
      /* {                 test: /\\.js$/,               //\u4E0D\u5305\u62ECnode_modules                 exclude: /node_modules/,                 use: [{                     loader: "eslint-loader",                     options: {                         enforce: 'pre'    //\u5F3A\u5236\u66F4\u6539\u987A\u5E8F\uFF0Cpre \u524D  post \u540E                     }                 }],             },*/
      {
        test: /\\.js$/, //\u666E\u901A\u7684loader
        //\u4E0D\u5305\u62ECnode_modules
        exclude: /node_modules/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "babel-loader",
          },
        ],
      },
      {
        test: /\\.html$/,
        use: ["html-withimg-loader"],
      },
      {
        test: /\\.(gif|png|jpg)$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "url-loader",
            options: {
              //\u56FE\u7247\u5C0F\u4E8E10kb\u5C31\u662F\u56FE\u7247\u5730\u5740\uFF0C\u5927\u4E8E\u6B63\u5E38\u6253\u5305\u6210base64\u683C\u5F0F\u7F16\u7801
              limit: 10000,
              //\u8F93\u51FA\u8DEF\u5F84
              outputPath: "img/",
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

const { merge } = require("webpack-merge");
//\u5F15\u5165webpack.base.conf.js\u6587\u4EF6
const base = require("./webpack.base.conf");
//\u5F15\u5165webpack
const webpack = require("webpack");
//\u8FDB\u884C\u5408\u5E76\uFF0C\u5C06webpack.base.conf.js\u4E2D\u7684\u914D\u7F6E\u5408\u5E76\u5230\u8FD9
module.exports = merge(base, {
  //\u6A21\u5757\u53C2\u6570
  mode: "development",
  devServer: {
    contentBase: "./dist",
    //\u7AEF\u53E3\u53F7
    port: "8383",
    inline: true,
    historyApiFallback: true, //\u5728\u5F00\u53D1\u5355\u9875\u5E94\u7528\u65F6\u975E\u5E38\u6709\u7528\uFF0C\u5B83\u4F9D\u8D56\u4E8EHTML5 history API\uFF0C\u5982\u679C\u8BBE\u7F6E\u4E3Atrue\uFF0C\u6240\u6709\u7684\u8DF3\u8F6C\u5C06\u6307\u5411index.html
    hot: true, //\u5141\u8BB8\u70ED\u52A0\u8F7D
  },
  //\u542F\u7528source-map\u65B9\u4FBF\u8C03\u8BD5
  devtool: "source-map",
  plugins: [
    //\u5B9A\u4E49\u5168\u5C40\u53D8\u91CF
    new webpack.DefinePlugin({
      //\u8FD9\u91CC\u5FC5\u987B\u8981\u89E3\u6790\u6210\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32\u8FDB\u884C\u5224\u65AD\uFF0C\u4E0D\u7136\u5C06\u4F1A\u88AB\u8BC6\u522B\u4E3A\u4E00\u4E2A\u53D8\u91CF
      DEV: JSON.stringify("dev"),
    }),
  ],
});

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const { merge } = require("webpack-merge");
const base = require("./webpack.base");

const path = require("path");
const OptimizeCss = require("optimize-css-assets-webpack-plugin");
const UglifyJsPlugin = require("uglifyjs-webpack-plugin");
const webpack = require("webpack");

module.exports = merge(base, {
  mode: "production",
  optimization: {
    minimizer: [
      //\u538B\u7F29CSS\u4EE3\u7801
      new OptimizeCss(),
      //\u538B\u7F29js\u4EE3\u7801
      new UglifyJsPlugin({
        //\u542F\u7528\u6587\u4EF6\u7F13\u5B58
        cache: true,
        //\u4F7F\u7528\u591A\u7EBF\u7A0B\u5E76\u884C\u8FD0\u884C\u63D0\u9AD8\u6784\u5EFA\u901F\u5EA6
        parallel: true,
        //\u4F7F\u7528 SourceMaps \u5C06\u9519\u8BEF\u4FE1\u606F\u7684\u4F4D\u7F6E\u6620\u5C04\u5230\u6A21\u5757
        sourceMap: true,
      }),
    ],
  },
  plugins: [
    //\u4F7F\u7528\u63D2\u4EF6\u5B9A\u4E49\u5168\u5C40\u53D8\u91CFDEV
    new webpack.DefinePlugin({
      DEV: JSON.stringify("production"),
    }),
  ],
});
